input.project: Public Sector Performance and Service Delivery Capacity Strengthening
input.region: National ministries and selected subnational administrations
input.problem: Public agencies have uneven capabilities in performance management and evidence-based decision-making for service delivery improvement.
input.target_population: Government managers and civil servants in reform, performance, and service delivery functions.
input.expected_change: Participating institutions adopt stronger performance management practices and improve selected services through diagnostics, process improvement pilots, and adaptive reviews.
key_activities: capacity development for performance management and data use
technical assistance for service improvement plans

fatal_flaws.label: BASELINE_TARGET_MISSING

fatal_flaw_messages: Indicators lack baseline and target values, making it impossible to measure progress.
Evidence excerpts for indicators are missing, reducing the credibility of the indicators.

critic_notes.revision_instructions:
Rule-based critic found no fatal issues. Tighten specificity and donor alignment where possible.

LLM reviewer notes: 1. Define clear baseline and target values for each indicator to enable progress measurement.
2. Provide detailed evidence excerpts for each indicator to support their selection and relevance.
3. Ensure that each objective in the Theory of Change is linked to specific, measurable outcomes and corresponding indicators.

objectives.title: Enhance Public Sector Performance
objectives.description: Improve efficiency, transparency, and accountability in public sector operations to better serve citizens.

objectives.title: Strengthen Service Delivery Capacity
objectives.description: Build institutional capacity to deliver quality public services effectively and equitably across Uzbekistan.

objectives.title: Promote Evidence-Based Policy Making
objectives.description: Support the use of data and evidence in policy formulation and implementation to ensure informed decision-making.

objectives.title: Foster Inclusive Governance
objectives.description: Encourage participatory governance practices to ensure that diverse voices are heard and considered in public sector decision-making.

objectives.title: Improve Financial Management Systems
objectives.description: Enhance financial management systems to ensure efficient allocation and use of public resources.
